column1: The Purple Pig////Then it was time for dessert. After downing some excellent quality espresso
column2: we settled in for a piece of chocolate blackout cake and panna cotta. The panna cotta had a smooth
column3: creamy texture and a caramel flavor along with mango sorbet
column5: and a sugary brittle for an added crunch. The chocolate blackout cake was incredibly rich but it was also paired with a bright passion fruit pur√©e that balanced the chocolate flavor nicely.
